At 20th level, you can assume the form of an angelic avenger. As a bonus action, you undergo a transformation. For 1 hour, you gain the following benefits:

  • Wings sprout from your back and grant you a flying speed of 60 feet.
  • You can use your Abjure Enemy and Vow of Enmity an unlimited number of times.
  • You emanate an aura of menace in a 30-foot radius. While you are not incapacitated, each hostile creature in the aura at the start of each of your turns must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or become frightened of you for 1 minute or until it takes any damage. Attack rolls against the frightened creature have advantage.

Once you use this feature, you can't use it again until you finish a long rest, unless you expend a 5th-level spell slot to use it again.
